 2022-04432022-04-29,  ,  ,  ,  PPC
ActCanadian Transportation Accident Investigation and Safety Board Act
PrecisRe-appointment of PAUL GEORGE DITTMANN of Ottawa, Ontario, as a full-time member of the Canadian Transportation Accident Investigation and Safety Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of two years, effective May 1, 2022.
AttachmentsAttachment
act: Canadian Transportation Accident Investigation and Safety Board Act
precis: Re-appointment of PAUL GEORGE DITTMANN of Ottawa, Ontario, as a full-time member of the Canadian Transportation Accident Investigation and Safety Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of two years, effective May 1, 2022.
